All Classes

Class Description
AccessPeriod
AccessPeriod is an entity class which stores the period of time that students are allowed to access the STAR System.
AddCourse
AddCourse implements the logic of adding a course for the student if the student enters a valid courseIndex.
AdminApp
AdminApp is a boundary class which interacts with the admin to perform any operation on MySTARS in the admin mode.
ChangeIndex
ChangeIndex swaps old index with a new index for the course registered by the user.
CheckCourseRecord
CheckCourseRecord searches the existence of an entry in the CourseRecords database based on an query(partial informations of a course).
CheckStudentInfo
CheckStudentInfo checks if given matricNum/username/email already exits in the database.
CheckStudentRecord
CheckStudentRecord ensures a course is not added if there is a clash or duplicate with an existing course the student already have in the database.
CourseRecord
CourseRecord is an entity class which stores all information of a course.
CourseRecordsTextRepository
CourseRecordsTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on CourseRecords, a database that stores information about all courses in NTU's MySTARS.
DatDatabase
DatRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on serializable files.
DropCourse
DropCourse implements the logic of dropping a course for the student
Encrypt
Encrypt is used for the encryption of password (using MD5) and generation of new keys.
GetAccessPeriod
GetAccessPeriod displays all possible access periods from the GlobalAccessPeriod database and returns the chosen access period to the user.
GetCourseRecord
GetCourseRecord contains multiple options to display information of courses in the CourseRecords database.
GetStudentInfo
GetStudentInfo displays student informations based on a some given information.
GetStudentListByCourseIndex
GetStudentListByCourseIndex allows a user to select a CourseIndex (eg.
GetStudentListByIndexNumber
GetStudentListByIndexNumber allows a user to select a IndexNum (eg.
GetStudentRecord
Displays the select student's course informations
GetWaitList
GetWaitList performs query on the WaitList database
GlobalAccessPeriodTextRepository
GlobalAccessPeriodTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on GlobalAccessPeriod, a database that stores all time periods that students are allowed to access the STAR System.
LoginController
LoginController is a control class which checks the correctness of the user's login information and directs the user to the appropriate interface (student or admin).
LoginInfo
LoginInfo is an entity class which stores the login information of a user.
LoginInterface
LoginInterface is a boundary class which prompts the user to enter his login informations and passes control to the control class LoginController.
LoginTextRepository
LoginTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on LoginsInfo, a database that stores login information of all users in NTU's MySTARS.
MyCalendar
Sends an email to student after a course is added.
mySTARSApp
mySTARSApp is a boundary class which starts the program by creating and running a LoginInterface
Repository
Repository is an interface which various read and write operations on different files and file types in the database will be implemented
SendMailTLS
Simulates sending of mails
Sorting
Implements sorting algorithms on array
Student
Student is an entity class which stores all the information of a student.
StudentInterface
StudentInterface is a boundary class which interacts with the student to perform any operation on MySTARS in the student mode.
StudentPersonalTextRepository
StudentPersonalInfoTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on StudentsInfo, a database that stores the information of all students.
StudentRecords
StudentRecords is an entity class which stores the information of a course taken by a student, and the student's identity informations.
StudentRecordTextRepository
StudentRecordTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on StudentRecords, a database that stores the information of all courses taken by every student and the student's identity informations.
SwapIndex
SwapIndex swaps the indexes of a course between 2 students.
TextDatabase
TextDatabase is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on text files.
UpdateCourseRecord
UpdateCourseRecord does the manipulation on the database storing all courses' informations(CourseRecords).
UpdateStudentInfo
UpdateStudentInfo does the manipulation the database related to students' general informations(StudentsInfo) and login informations(LoginsInfo).
UpdateStudentRecord
Updates the AU of a selected course in the StudentRecords database
WaitList
WaitList is an entity class which stores the number of people on the waiting queue for each course
WaitListTextRepository
WaitListTextRepository is a boundary class which performs read and write operations on WaitList, a database that stores information about the number of students on waitlist for each course.
